body: I know there have been lots of lists like "rate the person above you in pvp" and "top 10 avicus pvpers", but I decided to make an actual list of the best avicus pvpers. The link is http://www.thetoptens.com/169142/. Currently, the top ten is just the top ten players in the leaderboard, it doesn't necessarily reflect how I view them as good at pvp. Make sure to go there and vote for your favorite, and also add new players or even yourself. Please refrain from adding random, irrelevant players who are either terrible at pvp or don't regularly play on avicus. Anyways, have fun, and let's see who becomes the actual champion ^-^
